scripts.build: npm run build-64 && npm run build-win32 && npm run build-linux32
scripts.build-64: node build.js && npm run build-mac && npm run build-win && npm run build-linux
scripts.build-mac: node build.js && electron-packager ./ 'Glyphr Studio' --app-bundle-id=glyphr-studio-desktop --icon=images/appicon.icns --asar --prune --out=build --overwrite=true --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --version=1.2.7 --app-version=0.2.0 && cd 'build/Glyphr Studio-darwin-x64' && rm -rf LICENSE* version && zip -9 -ry ../Glyphr.Studio-darwin-x64.zip '../Glyphr Studio-darwin-x64' && cd ../../
scripts.build-win: node build.js && electron-packager ./ 'Glyphr Studio' --app-bundle-id=glyphr-studio-desktop --version-string.FileDescription='Glyphr Studio Desktop' --icon=images/appicon.ico --asar --prune --out=build --overwrite=true --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --version=1.2.7 --app-version=0.2.0 && cd 'build/Glyphr Studio-win32-x64' && rm -rf LICENSE* version && zip -9 -ry ../Glyphr.Studio-win32-x64.zip '../Glyphr Studio-win32-x64' && cd ../../
scripts.build-win32: node build.js && electron-packager ./ 'Glyphr Studio' --app-bundle-id=glyphr-studio-desktop --version-string.FileDescription='Glyphr Studio Desktop' --icon=images/appicon.ico --asar --prune --out=build --overwrite=true --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --version=1.2.7 --app-version=0.2.0 && cd 'build/Glyphr Studio-win32-ia32' && rm -rf LICENSE* version && zip -9 -ry ../Glyphr.Studio-win32-ia32.zip '../Glyphr Studio-win32-ia32' && cd ../../
scripts.build-linux: node build.js && electron-packager ./ 'Glyphr Studio' --app-bundle-id=glyphr-studio-desktop --asar --prune --out=build --overwrite=true --platform=linux --arch=x64 --version=1.2.7 --app-version=0.2.0 && cd 'build/Glyphr Studio-linux-x64' && rm -rf LICENSE* version && zip -9 -ry ../Glyphr.Studio-linux-x64.zip '../Glyphr Studio-linux-x64' && cd ../../
